feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:59 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 10:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: W 25 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
